item.title: What happened next when SPY jumped over 2%
item.description: Last week, SPY jump over 2% on Thursday This was surprising for many as the market is already up a lot. So, I wanted to see what happened the next day when SPY jumped over 2%. Here are the results over the last 10 years. The next day change after a 2% jump Next Day Change Number of Occurrences < 0 36 > 0 25 > 1 % 13 > 2 % 3 > 3 % 1 This doesn’t tell us much, but it does give us a good indication of what is going on.

item.title: [2020-11-21] ETFs momentum report
